text: Fantastic gaming laptop for the price. Getting amazing FPS in Cyberpunk 2077 and Call of Duty: Warzone. The build quality of the HP Pavilion 15.6" FHD IPS Gaming Laptop, Intel Quad Core i5-8300H 2.3 GHz, 8GB DDR4 RAM, 500GB HDD, NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 Ti 4GB, Backlit Keyboard, GbE LAN, USB Type-C, Windows 10 is solid, and the port selection is a joy to use. A definite 5 stars!

Exceeded my expectations! Perfect for AAA gaming. The NVIDIA GTX 1050 in the HP Pavilion 15.6" FHD IPS Gaming Laptop, Intel Quad Core i5-8300H 2.3 GHz, 8GB DDR4 RAM, 500GB HDD, NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 Ti 4GB, Backlit Keyboard, GbE LAN, USB Type-C, Windows 10 is a powerhouse. Battery life is decent for a gaming laptop too. Very satisfied with this purchase.

Exceeded my expectations! Perfect for competitive gaming. The NVIDIA GTX 1050 in the HP Pavilion 15.6" FHD IPS Gaming Laptop, Intel Quad Core i5-8300H 2.3 GHz, 8GB DDR4 RAM, 500GB HDD, NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 Ti 4GB, Backlit Keyboard, GbE LAN, USB Type-C, Windows 10 is a powerhouse. Battery life is decent for a gaming laptop too. Very satisfied with this purchase.

Absolutely love this laptop! The performance for content creation and gaming is incredible, especially the NVIDIA GTX 1050. Boots up super fast and handles everything I throw at it. The port selection is also top-notch. Highly recommend for anyone looking for a beast like the HP Pavilion 15.6" FHD IPS Gaming Laptop, Intel Quad Core i5-8300H 2.3 GHz, 8GB DDR4 RAM, 500GB HDD, NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 Ti 4GB, Backlit Keyboard, GbE LAN, USB Type-C, Windows 10!

Absolutely love this laptop! The performance for streaming games is incredible, especially the NVIDIA GTX 1050. Boots up super fast and handles everything I throw at it. The screen brightness is also top-notch. Highly recommend for anyone looking for a beast like the HP Pavilion 15.6" FHD IPS Gaming Laptop, Intel Quad Core i5-8300H 2.3 GHz, 8GB DDR4 RAM, 500GB HDD, NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 Ti 4GB, Backlit Keyboard, GbE LAN, USB Type-C, Windows 10!
